text: Joseph Robert "Joe" Wright, Jr. (born 1938) is an American businessman and politician. He served as Director of the Office of Management and Budget from 1988 through 1989. ==Other websites== *Jefferson Consulting biography Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Directors of the Office of Management and Budget Category:Politicians from Tulsa, Oklahoma Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Businesspeople from Tulsa, Oklahoma
title: Joseph Robert Wright, Jr.
